h2_title: The Webbed Hollow Luojia Fragrant Vines
content: This Luojia Fragrant Vine can be found in the center of the settlement in the Middle of the Hollow. It is guarded by the Scorpion Prince, so take him down and absorb his Spirit before picking up the vine.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Luojia_Fragrant_Vine_Locations.md', within the main section titled 'Luojia Fragrant Vine Locations', specifically from the subsection 'The Webbed Hollow Luojia Fragrant Vines' and the sub-subsection 'Middle Hollow Luojia Fragrant Vine'.
The content is as follows:
This Luojia Fragrant Vine can be found in the center of the settlement in the Middle of the Hollow. It is guarded by the Scorpion Prince, so take him down and absorb his Spirit before picking up the vine.
